title: Febreze Font
content:
HI!  
anyone know the font of this Logo??

[http://www.febreze.it/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124044802/http:/www.febreze.it/ "http://www.febreze.it/")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [header1.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124044802/http:/typophile.com/files/header1.gif) | 16.93 KB |
author: robertofratoni

comments.content:
u think?? but Oust have the same font...or something similar  
 [http://www.oust.it/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124044802/http:/www.oust.it/ "http://www.oust.it/")

u think?? but Oust have the same font...or something similar  
 [http://www.oust.it/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124044802/http:/www.oust.it/ "http://www.oust.it/")
Oust seems to have a font made from the logo. It’s not all that similar tho. Still think febreze is custom ’cause almost all of this stuff is.

The font for 'Oust' is [ITC Airstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124044802/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/airstream/)  
They've redrawn the capital O in the word.

Oust I believe is Timothy Donaldson'e Airstream.  
I think it may seem to have a similar feel, but overall maybe not very close.

You might try something like:

One of MIchael Clark's designs P22 Pooper, Sneaky or Sweepy.  
If you open these up a bit and stretch a few things you could come reasonably close.

Bendy... Beat me to it.

I was just typing this when Michael called, so it took a while to post. I almost was going to add another suggestion similar to Michael's, but he pointed out there were letters from that other font that appeared to have been copied from Michael's. I suppose thats Off Topic here, though.
